name: Keeper of the Sacred Flame
description:
Tend to the Flames and keep the Peace

(To start the experience, touch the flame in the center of title scene)

This is my first real VR experience, and my first Game Jam entry.  If you decide to give a it a play, I'd love to hear your feedback! 

I was able to put a good bit of polish on the beginning, but halfway through I had to rush to finish everything.  I'll keep working on this, and hopefully in another week or so I'll be able to post a higher quality final version. 

(Tested on HTC Vive. It should work with any PCVR headset, but I'm not sure about the quest or quest 2. )
